languages.text: "Пока долг не разведет наши пути, я вижу будущее с вами коротким мигом. Но мигом счастливым".

traits.locale_text: "Пока долг не разведет наши пути, я вижу будущее с вами коротким мигом. Но мигом счастливым".

languages.text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."
languages.original_text: "Пока долг не разведет наши пути, я вижу будущее с вами коротким мигом. Но мигом счастливым".

traits.locale_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."
"Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."
"Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."
"Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."
"Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."

languages.text: “那就直到职责将我们分开。我知道我们的未来只有短暂的片刻，但那也是无上幸福的片刻。”
languages.original_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."

traits.locale_text: “那就直到职责将我们分开。我知道我们的未来只有短暂的片刻，但那也是无上幸福的片刻。”

languages.text: "Bis zu dem Tag, an dem die Pflicht uns auseinandertreibt, sehe ich unsere gemeinsame Zukunft als flüchtigen Moment. Doch es ist ein Moment der Glückseligkeit."
languages.original_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."

traits.locale_text: "Bis zu dem Tag, an dem die Pflicht uns auseinandertreibt, sehe ich unsere gemeinsame Zukunft als flüchtigen Moment. Doch es ist ein Moment der Glückseligkeit."

languages.text: « En attendant le jour où le devoir nous séparera, je vois notre avenir ensemble comme un moment fugace, mais un moment de béatitude. »
languages.original_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."

traits.locale_text: « En attendant le jour où le devoir nous séparera, je vois notre avenir ensemble comme un moment fugace, mais un moment de béatitude. »

languages.text: «Nos veo juntos en el futuro, hasta que el deber nos separe».
languages.original_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."

traits.locale_text: «Nos veo juntos en el futuro, hasta que el deber nos separe».

languages.text: 「責務が私たちを引き離すまで、私たちが一緒にいる未来は、はかない一瞬だと考えている。だが、この上ない喜びの一瞬なのだ」
languages.original_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."

traits.locale_text: 「責務が私たちを引き離すまで、私たちが一緒にいる未来は、はかない一瞬だと考えている。だが、この上ない喜びの一瞬なのだ」

languages.text: "Vazifemiz bizi ayrı düşürene dek. Birlikteliğimizin ömrü uzun değil, farkındayım. Belki bir anlık mutluluk."
languages.original_text: "Until the day duty drives us apart, I see our future together as a fleeting moment. But it is a moment of bliss."
